tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name TEXT,
  market_condition TEXT,
  historical_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR,
    trading_strategy_id INT,
    closing_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    market_id INT,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (market_id) REFERENCES MarketConditions(market_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    data_id INT,
    success_rate FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES TradingStrategies(strategy_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES HistoricalData(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(50),
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    trade_volume INT
);
